value.body: Princess of the Northern Water Tribe
value.text: Princess of the Northern Water Tribe
value.value: Princess of the Northern Water Tribe
value.value_text: Princess of the Northern Water Tribe

paragraphs.body: Princess Yue was the sixteen-year-old ruler of the ${link_0} at the North Pole. Her character is a composite of her ${link_1} and her ${link_2}, functioning as both ${link_3}'s love interest and the head of state due to her father's untimely death.
paragraphs.text: Princess Yue was the sixteen-year-old ruler of the Northern Water Tribe at the North Pole. Her character is a composite of her animated counterpart and her father, functioning as both Sokka's love interest and the head of state due to her father's untimely death.

paragraphs.body: Princess Yue told Sokka that she was a stillborn baby until she was revived by the Moon Spirit:
paragraphs.text: Princess Yue told Sokka that she was a stillborn baby until she was revived by the Moon Spirit:

paragraphs.body: When Aang and the others arrived at the Northern Water Tribe, she welcomed them and befriended Sokka, who became her love interest. When the ${link_0} fleet came to invade the Northern Water Tribe sixteen years later, Commander ${link_1} captured and stabbed the Moon Spirit to death. This caused the moon to turn red and Yue to faint and weaken.
paragraphs.text: When Aang and the others arrived at the Northern Water Tribe, she welcomed them and befriended Sokka, who became her love interest. When the Fire Nation fleet came to invade the Northern Water Tribe sixteen years later, Commander Zhao captured and stabbed the Moon Spirit to death. This caused the moon to turn red and Yue to faint and weaken.

paragraphs.body: Yue deciding to give her life back to the Moon Spirit.
paragraphs.text: Yue deciding to give her life back to the Moon Spirit.

paragraphs.body: Yue gave her life back to the ${link_0} by lying beside it in the oasis pool. Blue-white life-force energy leaped from Yue onto the Moon Spirit. In the process, Yue's hair turned from white to black. Unlike the animated series, Yue's body did not disappear or transform into the new Moon Spirit. The Moon Spirit swam again and rejoined its partner, the Ocean Spirit. ${link_1} subsequently lifted her lifeless body out of the pool and put her on the ground, and Sokka grieved over her death.
paragraphs.text: Yue gave her life back to the Moon Spirit by lying beside it in the oasis pool. Blue-white life-force energy leaped from Yue onto the Moon Spirit. In the process, Yue's hair turned from white to black. Unlike the animated series, Yue's body did not disappear or transform into the new Moon Spirit. The Moon Spirit swam again and rejoined its partner, the Ocean Spirit. Iroh subsequently lifted her lifeless body out of the pool and put her on the ground, and Sokka grieved over her death.

paragraphs.body: Yue kissing ${link_0}, right before her subsequent demise.
paragraphs.text: Yue kissing Sokka, right before her subsequent demise.

paragraphs.body: Yue was a kind, gentle, faithful and hopeful person. She was extremely protective of her people, and was determined to do anything to save them, going so far as to giving up her own life to resurrect the Moon Spirit.
paragraphs.text: Yue was a kind, gentle, faithful and hopeful person. She was extremely protective of her people, and was determined to do anything to save them, going so far as to giving up her own life to resurrect the Moon Spirit.

paragraphs.body: Yue found her love in ${link_0}, a seventeen-year-old warrior from the ${link_1}. However, the relationship came to a tragic end when Yue sacrificed herself by giving her life back to the Moon Spirit. Her death had greatly affected Sokka.
paragraphs.text: Yue found her love in Sokka, a seventeen-year-old warrior from the Southern Water Tribe. However, the relationship came to a tragic end when Yue sacrificed herself by giving her life back to the Moon Spirit. Her death had greatly affected Sokka.
